data.contentText:
It is very important that you sign any medical records that you write (on paper or electronically)

NeoTree is an electronic medical record so make sure to sign your name or HCW-ID (Either is fine)

Your HCW-ID is the first 2 letters of your first name followed by first 2 letters of your surname (lower case)

It is very important that you sign any medical records that you write (on paper or electronically)

NeoTree is an electronic medical record so make sure to sign your name or HCW-ID (Either is fine)

Your HCW-ID is the first 2 letters of your first name followed by first 2 letters of your surname (lower case)
